content: वक्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Crooked(<ab>fig.</ab> also), bent, curved, winding, tortuous; वक्रः पंथा यदपि भवतः प्रस्थितस्योत्तराशां <ls>Me. 27</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 29.</ls> {@--2@} Round about, indirect, evasive, circuitous, equivocation, ambiguous (as a speech); किमेतैर्वक्रभणितैः <ls>Ratn. 2</ls>; वक्रवाक्यरचनारमणीयः… सुभ्रुवां प्रववृते परिहासः <ls>Śi. 10. 12</ls>; see वक्रोक्ति also. {@--3@} Curled, curling, crisped (as hair). {@--4@} Retrograde (as motion). {@--5@} Dishonest, fraudulent, crooked in disposition. {@--6@} Cruel, malignant (as a planet). {@--7@} Prosodially long. --क्रः {@--1@} The planet Mars. {@--2@} The planet Saturn. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of the demon Tripura. --क्रं {@--1@} The bend or arm of a river. {@--2@} Retrograde motion (of a planet).
